attributes.action: Ban Police From Over Patroling South West Region
attributes.additional_details: I am asking people who live in the Southwest Region to sign this petition in order to stop over patrolling by police particularly in the Sidmouth, Sidford area. There is no crime here it is simply a nuisance to people who wish to live in the area.

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter.  Devon and Cornwall Police, with their Police and Crime Commissioner, determine local policing priorities.
